title: Easy On Credit! Newly Remodeled!  Reduced!
posting_body: Location, price, renovations and look and lease special cannot be beat.
This adorable one bedroom study (2bedroom/1 bath) has been newly remodeled and at this price will not last long!
Easy access to all major streets and highways.
Upgrades include custom closet, new cabinets, counter tops, brushed nickle hardware and hard wood flooring (in some units).
Management is easy on credit and can work with some broken leases.
Don't let this awesome deal pass you by.
For appointment to view and exact move in dates call Bobbi/agent at
